title.rendered: Official Central Johannesburg College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Vhembe College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Vhembe College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Vhembe College based on the information provided within it.

Vhembe College Student Portal

Note: Vhembe College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Vhembe College Prospectus 2024

The Vhembe College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.cjc.edu.za/.

VHEMBE COLLEGE PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

see also Official Ekurhuleni East FET College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
